1593880.name: SPECTEARED
1593880.description:
SPECTEARED is a first person horror game placed in near-dystopian future.

You're participant of debuting reality show.
You're wearing tough outfit which is transmitting your senses and feeling to the viewers.
The suit gives you special abilities, like hacking electronic devices,
gives ability to hear far sounds, to see in the dark etc.

You are led to the place where transmission will start.
Along the way, you learn about the research being conducted in the complex.
The purpose of the show is to test the equipment you are wearing,
to test the traps technology and to check the behavior mutants bred here - but these are only intended for subsequent SPECTEARED transmissions.



During a short warm-up you get acquainted with the rules, functionalities of the suit, the operation of traps so as not to die.
After the warm-up, this is the moment: you have to move the lever that will start the countdown for the start of the show!
But something is not right...
The entire facility shakes, explosion is heard behind you.
The ceiling starts to collapse, you hear panic echoing as well as distorted screams in your helmet receiver.
The lights go out... After some time, you hear a message that the emergency power has been restored.
The lights are back, but not as bright and steady as before.
You can't contact anyone.
The only way is going back, but you find there massacred rooms.
By restarting the power, the traps seem to have no safety lock and react deadly on everyone.
You find a broken gate that now seems to be your only way forward...



Upcoming features:

Game implements custom solutions for animating characters, simulating audio waves, AI of spectators and procedural level generation.
- Each character in the game is animated with simulation of real muscle behavior and inverse kinematics manipulation to erase artificial animation feeling.
- Audio waves simulation provides new way of identifying danger in really immersive way, audio is very important for the game mechanics.
- Custom Procedural Generation algorithms will generate each set of facility in different way each time played!

Game is open for people who enjoy jumpscares and for ones who don't like it.
In any time of playthrough you can switch intensity of jumpscares with simple slider.
